title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2818.2 - Reapplication review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2818.2 - Reapplication review

State Regulations
(a) All
applications will be logged in with date received, name of applicant, amount of
funding requested. (b) All
applicants will be sent an acknowledgment letter. (c) Rural preservation companies submitting
incomplete applications will not have their applications evaluated and may be
subject to a delay in funding. (d) Late reapplication submissions may result in the delay, reduction or loss of
funding. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2818.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
